title: WOW  got the bucks? 4b 3.5 bath no fee
posting_body: Awesome home for rent steps to new green line and bike path to Davis sq
The 4th bedroom is small for office or single bedroom.
No lead paint brand new renovation
Owner expects renters to take well care of the home.
4 parking   31/2 baths 3 levels A stunning dazzling regal home and ready now.
$7700 plus utilities Pets may require additional security.
NO FEE 1st last security needed to move in
EMAIL FOR THE PICS MOVIE AND QUESTIONS
